subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is not a former capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राजधानी के सहरसिंह के निष्कर्षन नहीं है।
explanation_en: Ajmer was never a capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: अजमेर राजस्थान के राजधानी नहीं है।
explanation: Explanation for question 2 will be added later.
question_en: Which among the following cities were the capital of Rajasthan at some point?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राजधानी में कौन स्थान मैं उन्नहीं है।
